sections.q: What is your only comfort in life and in death?
sections.a: That I am not my own, but belong—body and soul, in life and in death—to my faithful Savior, Jesus Christ.

sections.q: What must you know to live and die in the joy of this comfort?
sections.a: Three things: first, how great my sin and misery are; second, how I am set free from all my sins and misery; third, how I am to thank God for such deliverance.
